idea-plugin.name: Maven Run Helper
idea-plugin.description:
Successor of "Maven build-this-module" plugin.

Adds actions to run maven goals for module that contains the current file.

Usage:
Right click in Editor | Run Maven.
Right click in Project View Toolbar | Run Maven.

Customize goals: Settings | Maven Run Plugin
Define shortcuts: Settings | Keymap | Plug-ins | Maven Run Plugin
